00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "TetDihedralWeight.hpp"
00035 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00036 #include "ReferenceMesh.hpp"
00037 #include <algorithm>
00038 
00039 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00040 
00041 static inline double
00042 da( double dot )
00043 { return 180 - (180/M_PI)*acos( dot ); }
00044 
00045 double TetDihedralWeight::get_weight( PatchData& pd, 
00046                                       size_t element,
00047                                       Sample ,
00048                                       MsqError& err )
00049 {
00050   const double eps = 1e-10;
00051 
00052   MsqMeshEntity &elem = pd.element_by_index( element );
00053   if (elem.get_element_type() != TETRAHEDRON) {
00054     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00055     return 0.0;
00056   }
00057 
00058   const size_t *indices = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00059   Vector3D v01, v02, v31, v32;
00060   if (refMesh) {
00061     const Mesh::VertexHandle* vtx_hdl = pd.get_vertex_handles_array();
00062     Mesh::VertexHandle handles[] = { vtx_hdl[indices[0]],
00063                                      vtx_hdl[indices[1]],
00064                                      vtx_hdl[indices[2]],
00065                                      vtx_hdl[indices[3]] };
00066     Vector3D coords[4];
00067     refMesh->get_reference_vertex_coordinates( handles, 4, coords, err );
00068     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00069 
00070     v01 = coords[1] - coords[0];
00071     v02 = coords[2] - coords[0];
00072     v31 = coords[1] - coords[3];
00073     v32 = coords[2] - coords[3];
00074   }
00075   else {  
00076     const MsqVertex* coords = pd.get_vertex_array();
00077     v01 = coords[indices[1]] - coords[indices[0]];
00078     v02 = coords[indices[2]] - coords[indices[0]];
00079     v31 = coords[indices[1]] - coords[indices[3]];
00080     v32 = coords[indices[2]] - coords[indices[3]];
00081   }
00082   
00083   Vector3D n012 = v02 * v01;
00084   Vector3D n013 = v31 * v01;
00085   Vector3D n023 = v02 * v32;
00086   Vector3D n123 = v31 * v32;
00087   
00088     // normalize face vectors.
00089   double l012 = n012.length();
00090   double l013 = n013.length();
00091   double l023 = n023.length();
00092   double l123 = n123.length();
00093   n012 *= (l012 < eps) ? 0.0 : 1.0/l012;
00094   n013 *= (l013 < eps) ? 0.0 : 1.0/l013;
00095   n023 *= (l023 < eps) ? 0.0 : 1.0/l023;
00096   n123 *= (l123 < eps) ? 0.0 : 1.0/l123;
00097   
00098     // calculate dihedral handles for each edge
00099   double ds[] = { da(n012 % n013),
00100                   da(n012 % n123),
00101                   da(n012 % n023),
00102                   da(n013 % n023),
00103                   da(n013 % n123),
00104                   da(n023 % n123) };
00105   
00106     // calculate weight from max dihedral handle
00107   double d = *std::max_element( ds, ds+6 );
00108   return 1/(1 + exp(-mA*(d - mCutoff)));
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 } // namespace MESQUITE_NS
